sourcing.instructions: - Arsenic: Specialty chemical suppliers or online chemical retailers.
steps: - Arsenic: Specialty chemical suppliers or online chemical retailers.
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, weigh and combine 1 g of arsenic, 6 g of boron, 21 g of nickel, and 1 g of palladium.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean, dry mixing container, weigh and combine 1 g of arsenic, 6 g of boron, 21 g of nickel, and 1 g of palladium.

steps: 1. Preheat an oven to 150 째C (302 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat an oven to 150 째C (302 째F).

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow it to cool down to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow it to cool down to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the cured solid sample from the mold gently to avoid breakage.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the cured solid sample from the mold gently to avoid breakage.
